title: Shadows in the Capital
description: Beka and Rena have been pardoned for the crimes that sent them to the Relean prison, but they soon discover that being cleared of the charges against them doesn't solve all the problems associated with their sentencing. They are unable to salvage their reputations, and they are faced with new challenges as they try to return to the lives they had before they were accused of murder. New dangers await them as they are brought to the regional capital of their home world of Taladin, where political intrigue, and betrayal complicate their recovery from the damages inflicted on them while in prison.
author: Diane Henson
